bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter fragment from Jesse W. Lazear to Mabel H. Lazear, September 8, 1900

div1.p: Lazear believes he is on the track of the yellow fever germ but this news must be kept secret for now.

div1.head: Letter fragment from Jesse W. Lazear to Mabel H. Lazear, September 8, 1900
div1.p:
a year the way things are now.
I rather think I am on the track of
the real germ, but nothing must be
said as yet, not same a hint
I have not mentioned it to a
soul.
